Title: In vivo multiplexed OPT and FLIM OPT of an adult zebrafish cancer disease model
Abstract: © OSA 2016.We report angular multiplexed OPT and FLIM OPT applied to in vivo imaging of cancer and FRET biosensors in adult zebrafish. Multiple-spectral 3-D datasets of entire adult zebrafish can be acquired in 3 minutes.
